title: Document the SOLR XML response schema in XMLSchema and DTD
description:
See this thread:

http://www.lucidimagination.com/search/document/e8bb6cac84c1f520/namespaces_in_response_solr_1586#cc50ba9e9d8fe2dc

For the background. The idea is to finally document the often alluded to (but never riefied) SOLR XML response schema/DTD.

comments.author: Chris A. Mattmann
comments.content: This issue is a duplicate of SOLR-17.

comments.author: Alexandre Rafalovitch
comments.content: It does not seem that there is enough business case for this documentation issue. Not even a single vote in 6 years. I suggest we close this until somebody comes up with specific need and bandwidth to make this happen.
